means: 发生( happen的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: A miracle is something that seems impossible but happens anyway.
sentence.Network_cn: 奇迹就是看似不可能，却发生了。

sentence.Network_en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

sentence.Network_en: We didn't"fix" anything. It'll be seen as it happens.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们没做任何手脚，该什么样就会什么样。

PerfectNetExp.abs: when this happens between a man and a woman ., 当这种情况发生在男女之间.
When an accident happens ., 当事故发生时.
Whatever happens , I ' m coming through ., 不管发生什么事 , 我都将挺过去.
That really is quite a thrill when it happens ., 当它发生的时候 , 那真是好一阵狂喜.

list.abs: 艾伦·艾克哈特 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... 《黑暗骑士》 The Dark Knight 《爱不胜防》 Love Happens 《兔子洞》 Rabbit Hole.
推荐几首杰克逊的经典 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... Heaven can wait-- 天堂可待 Whatever happens-- 无论发生什么 thriller-- 颤栗.
疯狂英语流行口语100句 ... 41. What’s wrong?（ 怎么回事？） 42. What happened?（ 发生什么事了？） 71. I’ve got it.（ 我懂了。）.
清风的博客 - 清风 - 网易博客 ... What's new? 有什么新鲜事？ What's happening? 在忙什么？ How are you? 你好吗？.

entry.def: Something that happens occurs or is done without being planned.

example.ex: We cannot say for sure what will happen...
example.tran: 我们无法确定会发生什么事。

example.ex: The accident happened close to Martha's Vineyard.
example.tran: 事故发生在玛莎葡萄园附近。

entry.def: If something happens, it occurs as a result of a situation or course of action.

example.ex: She wondered what would happen if her parents found her...
example.tran: 她不知道如果父母找到自己会有什么结果。

example.ex: He trotted to the truck and switched on the ignition. Nothing happened.
example.tran: 他匆匆走向卡车并转动点火开关，结果没有任何反应。

entry.tran: （尤指不愉快的事）发生（在…身上）;(某人)遭到;遇到
entry.def: When something, especially something unpleasant, happens to you, it takes place and affects you.

example.ex: If we had been spotted at that point, I don't know what would have happened to us...
example.tran: 如果当时我们被发现了，我不知道会有什么后果。

example.ex: It's the best thing that ever happened to me.
example.tran: 这是我所遇到的最好的事情了。

entry.def: If you happen to do something, you do it by chance. If it happens that something is the case, it occurs by chance.

example.ex: We happened to discover we had a friend in common...
example.tran: 我们凑巧发现我们有一个共同的朋友。

example.ex: I looked in the nearest paper, which happened to be the Daily Mail...
example.tran: 我仔细看了一下离自己最近的那份报纸，正巧是份《每日邮报》。

entry.tran: 碰巧，恰恰（尤引出令人意外的事）
entry.def: You use as it happens in order to introduce a statement, especially one that is rather surprising.

example.ex: She called Amy to see if she had any idea of her son's whereabouts. As it happened, Amy had.
example.tran: 她打电话给埃米，看她是否知道自己儿子的行踪。埃米还真就知道。

auth_sentence.content: Quite a variety of things, as it happens.
auth_sentence.res_content: Quite a variety of things, as it happens.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Quite a variety of things, as it happens.

auth_sentence.content: But what happens when the film is taken away?
auth_sentence.res_content: But what happens when the film is taken away?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But what happens when the film is taken away?

auth_sentence.content: When it happens the walls of the house vibrate.
auth_sentence.res_content: When it happens the walls of the house vibrate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When it happens the walls of the house vibrate.

Sentence.sentence: What happens if we lie, cheat, steal, or violate other ethical standards?
According to the speaker what happens to some proverbs with the passage of time?
Well, it happens everyday to high schoolers.
Food waste in less-developed countries happens mainly at the producers' end.
That's what happens when you're the world's biggest creditor: you get to drop hints like that, which would be enough by themselves to create international economic chaos if they were ever leaked.
It is actually something deeper than mere happiness: it is joy, which the monk（僧侣）David Steindl-Rast describes as "that kind of happiness that doesn't depend on what happens
